word: Light has been coming to me that unless we have more evident movings of the Spirit of God, and greater manifestations of divine power working in our midst, many of God's people will be overcome. Satanic agencies will come in, as they came to me. But we cannot afford to yield to the power of the enemy.-- Manuscript 25, Jan. 28, 1910, "An Address to the Workers Assembled at the Pacific Union Conference."
